text: Anuraupabharae (uparaokta tinita pad'dhatita) ami tomara prati amara nirdesara paraa rauhaka ahi karaicho. Tumi jana nachila kitaba ki arau imana ki! Kintu ami iyaka nura bana'icho, yara dbaraa ami amara bandasakalara majara paraa yaka iccha hidayata dana karao. Niscaya tumi sarala pathara pine dika nirdesana diya
